alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Camden; Coastal Ocean; Cumberland; Eastern Monmouth; Gloucester; Northwestern Burlington; Ocean; Salem; Southeastern Burlington; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 10:50PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern New Castle, northern Kent, northeastern Queen Anne`s, northeastern Caroline, Kent, Ocean, Camden, Atlantic, Cumberland, Salem, Gloucester, Burlington and southern Monmouth Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1050 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Princeton to Elkridge. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Toms River, Vineland, Dover, Long Branch, Millville, Bridgeton, Middletown, Asbury Park, Cumberland, Lakewood, Jackson, Howell, Evesham, Voorhees, Medford, Barnegat, Glassboro, Tinton Falls, Lindenwold and Hammonton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 16 and 34. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 44 and 111. Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 12 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic; Camden; Coastal Ocean; Cumberland; Eastern Monmouth; Gloucester; Northwestern Burlington; Ocean; Salem; Southeastern Burlington; Western Monmouth
